name: Help America
description:
In this game, you will be helping America. 

You will have nine endings.

I hope you enjoy.

Good luck, and thanks for playing!

For best experience, play on fullscreen. 

This game is inspired by the webcomic/anime Hetalia. 

I do not own Hetalia or any of its characters. Himaruya does.

The only ship in this game will be hinted RusAme (Russia x America) and will be boyxboy. Don't like, don't play. Don't say I didn't warn you.

This is also my first time at making a game on any platform.
